EmailTemplate.subject: RE: Adva Optival setup with MBO Partners (1337029883.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - 110 Clean Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Hi James, Hope you are doing well. I just wanted follow up with the email below and ask you Where Adva was in terms of the paper work. You can find the links to the agreement and SOW below: MSA SOW Thanks,Sara___________________________________ <http://info.mbopartners.com/rs/mbo/images/MBO_Exec_MSA_Template.pdf>SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.comw: www.mbopartners.com Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com and permanently delete the e-mail and files. -----Original Message----- From: Sara Conde Sent: Friday, April 13, 2012 3:43 PM To: 'Matt'; James Buchanan Subject: RE: Adva Optival setup with MBO Partners Dear James , On behalf of everyone here at MBO Partners, we look forward to working with your firm. MBO Partners caters to two markets. Our first service is designed for independent consultants and small businsses who choose to plug into our MBO Services Cloud to make it easier for them to work with their clients. We take care of all the back office administrative, HR, regulatory and financial issues so they can stay focused on delivering on their services. The second is how we help enterprise organizations engage more efficently and safely with their contract workforce. We have also put together a short one page collateral that explains how we work and the markets we serve. Attached is the standard agreement and statement of work we use when engaging our Associates with their clients. Please review and complete it, and return a signed copy to me. And, please do not hesitate to contact me if you have any questions. Thanks again, and I look forward to working with you. Best regards,Sara___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services AdvisorMBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.comw: www.mbopartners.com Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com and permanently delete the e-mail and files. -----Original Message-----From: Matt [mailto:matt@use.net]Sent: Friday, April 13, 2012 3:32 PMTo: James BuchananCc: Sara CondeSubject: Adva Optival setup with MBO Partners James, this is Sara. Sara, this is James. James, Sara will help you get set up in their system (and vice versa) so I can bill you via their service. If you have any questions/concerns, let me know. --tangled strands of DNA explain the way that I behave.http://www.clock.org/~matt ---------- Forwarded message ----------Date: Fri, 13 Apr 2012 11:28:01 -0400From: Sara Conde <sconde@mbopartners.com>To: Matt Hargett <matt@use.net>Subject: RE: MBO Partners - Time Card Reminder Hi Matt, Yes, please put them in contract with me. I will send you a separate email about re-enrolling with MBO. Thanks!Sara ___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services AdvisorMBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.comw: www.mbopartners.com Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com and permanently delete the e-mail and files. -----Original Message-----From: Matt Hargett [mailto:matt@use.net]Sent: Thursday, April 12, 2012 6:23 PMTo: Sara CondeSubject: Re: MBO Partners - Time Card Reminder This would be a totally different client. Can I put them in contact with you? my initial rate with them will be $175/hour. On Apr 10, 2012, at 7:29 AM, Sara Conde <sconde@mbopartners.com> wrote: > Hi Matt,> > Good to hear from you! Would you be working with Pivotal labs again or with a different client? I want to make sure I get you to the correct contact.> > Thanks!> Sara> ___________________________________> SARA CONDE> Consultant Services Advisor> MBO Partners> > t: 703.793.6028> f: 703.793.6068> e: sconde@mbopartners.com> w: www.mbopartners.com> > Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential.
